entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:37 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 5:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: SE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
